website_summaries.verdict: This versatile hot and cold therapy pack can be wrapped around virtually any body part and secures with hook-and-loop straps, leaving you free to get on with your day.
pros: Large dimensions, superb flexibility, and lengthy straps make it possible to comfortably use this option on awkward, hard-to-reach areas
Maintains temperature for up to 30 min., but many users find that it provides relief for up to an hour
cons: Straps are long and wrapping them around narrow areas can be awkward

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for his chronic lower back pain. He uses it all the time. It's so easy to wrap around his waist. It's flexible and comfortable. Best option for an ice pack that we've found.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cold pack, I am using in on an arthritic knee and it is a big help. The velcro stretch wrap is great it stays put on my knee. It is made with 3 separate packs so it flexes and wraps around 3/4 of my knee joint. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Buccetti

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I always keep it in the freezer, and it tucks away nicely in a side door/doesn't take up much real estate. The cold lasts for a good hour or so. If I need it hot, it handles heat well too. The heated gel doesn't last as long if you ask me, but it's easy enough to pop it in the microwave again to get it warm again. The size is perfect for the areas that usually hurt for me (between my shoulder blades, or my lower back).
customer_reviews.author: WickedSmart

customer_reviews.title: ... just recently received my TheraPAQ and I am very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I just recently received my TheraPAQ and I am very happy with it. I have spinal stenosis and I needed something that was easy and comfortable to use for my back pain. This was an ideal choice. It is easy to store in freezer as the 3 sections can overlap and not take up a lot of room. I have only used it for the cold therapy so can't attest to the heat therapy. I have just ordered a second one for my daughter as she also has some back pain. I would recommend this to anyone that wants something easy to store, and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Pam M.

customer_reviews.title: The best to have after a knee replacement!
customer_reviews.text: I bought three for my knee surgery,only used two ,one on and then would put it back in the freezer and use the second one for the next 20 minute session ,later. My wife has used the third for heat and it works great too! The long straps make it easy to strap above the knee to hold it in place. A minor negative if you put it in the freezer and are too lazy to put the strap in nicely to stick together and you have to free them apart,not a big deal.I use them three or four times a day ,almost 6weeks after my knee replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Heat on the go!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I have endometriosis and I love that I can strap this on my tummy and put on my sweater and you can't tell and it stays hot for a long time after only microwaving for 90 seconds. Love love. Also the strap is elasticy and comfortable and Velcro is strong will not pop off. I highly reccomend this for cramps or back pain!!
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Ok product, NO RETURNS ALLOWED!
customer_reviews.text: Stays cold, but it's not big enough for the entire knee area, just the cap. Turns out I was sent the small one. They don't allow returns. They sent the wrong product and now I am stuck with it. DO NOT ORDER.
customer_reviews.author: Traveller2

customer_reviews.title: Needless to say I really like this product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one for my husband and he used it so often I needed to get one for myself....THEN....I bought yet another to give my son! Needless to say I really like this product. The Velcro belt is what the other ice packs have been missing in my life! It stays cold a good long time and I could not be happier with my purchase. (make that purchases)!
customer_reviews.author: alieniva

customer_reviews.title: Customer oriented company & Good product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for lower back pain relief. When I received it the amount of gel in the hot/cold pac was less than I expected. I contacted the company and their response to my complaint was surprisingly professional and customer oriented. They went out of their way to make sure I was satisfied with their product. They promptly sent me a replacement TheraPAQ and let me keep the original one. The second one did have more gel. It’s great for lower back pain and for using around other joints. I have not used it as a hot pac yet. I would recommend this product for those with arthritic pain issues and joint & muscle pain.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: cannot hold the heat a long time. After 2 minutes in microwave, it got cold in a minute.
customer_reviews.author: jojo12345

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage, stays in place, and stays cold for more than 30min!
customer_reviews.text: I use this pack primarily on my shoulders. It stays cold for way longer than advertised. It can be used also for the arms and legs but you may just have to lay the pack over the desired area instead of wrapping it all around because I think the pack area was not intended to overlap and use the Velcro straps at the same time if you can picture what I'm trying to describe.
customer_reviews.author: RSC702

customer_reviews.title: Just OK - Gel was not balance in each section
customer_reviews.text: For the price, its enough to get you by. The gel which takes the hot or cold was very full on one section and very low in the other two. So when I would heat it up, the two with low volume would get extremely scolding hot, while the more full section was still in need of being heated. Also the blue sleeve melted. Just ok product, but only 20 bucks so no biggie
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and adjust
customer_reviews.text: This works so much better than the flimsy packs that i used to stuff into my pants waist line to cool down my back. This is easy to adjust, provides plenty of cold, and totally stays put while I"m moving around. Other review have commented that the 3 cells might not be evenly filled. I found that the middle cell was a little lacking in gel, but it was easy to massage the gel from the outer packets into the middle packet, as suggested in the instructions. It does frost up a bit during use, but this has not really caused a problem and certainly has not caused my pants to get wet.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gossage

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the design and results
customer_reviews.text: Have used this ice pack several times for various reasons. It's constructed well and the flexibility of design and the Velcro straps help to use it on a multitude of places in your body. I hate to rate it for pain relief because I think that's different for different people. With other ice packs I often have to wrap them in something so they don't drip and to make them more comfortable on my skin. NOT with this ice pack! It isn't uncomfortable straight from freezer to my skin. It doesn't get wet as it warms.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast Relief!
customer_reviews.text: I love this ice pack! I purchased two of them. They get cold fast and stay cold in the freezer. I can wear it over my shoulder or wrap it across my chest which is mostly where I suffer from pain. It helps relieve lower back pain too. The only negative would be that I'm a thin person and the Velcro strap is quite long. I end up having to secure it with another strap at times. But I understand they make it with expandable material to fit all sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Danielle Reese

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: My twins play competitive ball. One is a pitcher the other a catcher. I got tired of doing magic tricks with ice bags and ace bandages and purchase this. Soooo much easier and its flexible enough to wrap a shoulder, elbow, or knee. I will say...DO NOT APPLY directly to the skin without some barrier...even just a paper towel...burned my sons skin. But there is a warning label on it that says don't apply to bare skin that he did not read...so DON'T APPLY TO BARE SKIN.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: No disappointment
customer_reviews.text: In anticipation of surgery to my neck, I pre-ordered 2 of these packs. One is kept in the freezer and one ready to heat in the microwave. They both perform exactly as expected and seem quite durable. The elastic Velcro straps hold the packs in place which secures them in place for easy use. This is a product I can recommend.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping your brew cold.
customer_reviews.text: Strap is a lil long. If They could fix that, that would be nice. Mmkay. Also they forgot the cover sheets on their TPS reports. It also doesn’t stay cold for too long. When it’s initially out of the freezer, its so cold it hurts then you have about 5 mins in that sweet spot of cold. After that it might as well be your kids hands on you skin. Why are their little hands always so cold btw? And sticky? They really are Gross little things.
customer_reviews.author: ZipheR

customer_reviews.title: can't get the liquid to level out so it is ...
customer_reviews.text: can't get the liquid to level out so it is equally spread out prior to freezing. so you have too much ice on one side and not enough on the other
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Convenient cold pak for use on lower back
customer_reviews.text: Bought a similar cold pack at Mayo Clinic and after much use and attempts at repair I went looking for a replacement. The pak from Mayo lasted more than 10 years with regular use (sometimes daily). This pak looks even more durable. As a LARGER sized woman I was concerned about the length of the elastic and was pleased it fit and with room to spare. This is a fantastic way to apply ice treatment to my lower back.and I look forward to using it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Green

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for after back surgery
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who had back surgery. We only used frozen. I think he really liked that it wrapped around him and staying in place. It's been almost 4 weeks since surgery and he still uses it quite a bit. We laid it flat in the freezer or curved a bit in areas he needed it to be. Its really been a ton better than a bag of ice that's lumpy.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: It really helps!
customer_reviews.text: First of all this company delivered the item SO quickly-i was impressed! Secondly, it truly works wonders. I have arthritic pain in my hip and every time I run it gets worse. I do my stretches but still... Then my brother in law recommended this pack and it really, really does work. I wrap it on (so easy and adjustable) then when it starts to get soft (15mins) i put it back in the freezer. I then put it back on in a slightly different area. Truthfully, it has helped more than anything else I have tried. And I had NO idea the cold would help as much as it does. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Rufus

customer_reviews.title: Great for pregnancy/sore lower back
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these. 1 for me because my lower back is always sore and the other for my pregnant daughter. My daughter loves it. I like it but I feel it’s a little to heavy to walk around w/it. I put it on a lay down. We both put a Thermacare heatwrap under it to make the heat stay longer.
customer_reviews.author: ireland22

customer_reviews.title: Best cold pack I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can velcro it so it hits the right spot on my back or shoulder. It has a soft material on one side so I don't have to worry about putting it against my skin. I keep it in the freezer and it is still movable when I take it out to use. This is the second one I have bought.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Great for reducing inflammation
customer_reviews.text: Large surface are provides good coverage for back pain relief. Freezes quickly and stays cold for 30+ minutes. The Velcro straps hold it in position
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall nice quality product, really delivers the cold
customer_reviews.text: The flexibility of the pack after being in the freezer is amazing. The plastic "fabric" really transfers the cold to the affected joint. Much more effective than the solid ice packs I've been using. Good quality product, although the straps are a bit weird. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Keith M

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: The strap is an added feature that bumped my review from 3 to 4. The stiffness and moisture when wearing it dropped from a 5 to 4. I use it for my shoulder and neck area. The material is a little stiff though it does loosen a bit as you wear it. However, as it cools, the material gets frosty and wet. Overall, I recommend the product for the price and ease of wearing because of the strap.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Great gel wrap
customer_reviews.text: Great product for back and chest. Wraps great around the body and is very elastictly. The Velcro makes a nice addition to the ice pack. The only downside I can think of is that the ice pack is not individually separated. The ice pack is made of three jointed packs witch can be an issue because once the bag starts to melt the gel stars to move to/shift from one bag to another. Leaving some bags to have more gel than the other. Uneven proportion.
customer_reviews.author: Fleama

customer_reviews.title: Pain Relief Flexible Ice Pack for Injuries by TheraPAQ
customer_reviews.text: Pain Relief Flexible Ice Pack for Injuries by TheraPAQ Hot/Cold Wrap has been wonderful. I used it multiple times as a cold pack following knee therapy. I later used it for toe pain. I took it on a plane to trip to have for use while away from home. I traveled with in with another ice pack and both arrived still frozen after 5 hours in flight. I have not used it as a hot pack as I keep it frozen in my freezer for quick use.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Price

customer_reviews.title: Quality made, fits everywhere.
customer_reviews.text: We've used this on our backs for a great adjustable fit. But I also used it on my calf and because to the excellent velcro straps, it worked perfectly. Freezes and heats evenly once syou adjust the gel inside after taking it out of the box. Nice when you pay for something that's top materials and it actually delivers - this does! Best pain pack I've owned in 40 years of buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Jim2day

customer_reviews.title: Fits Great
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this ice pack. I twisted my ankle and it is hard to put an ice/heat pack on the area unless it wraps around. This Ice Pack worked perfectly and stays put with the Velcro straps. I will buy again when this one is worn out.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Kilborn

customer_reviews.title: Froze in the freezer very quickly.
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a mechanic and his job is very hard on his back and his knees. I bought him this ice pack to help with his knee pain, and the fact that he went to bed with a ziplock bag filled with ice and you guessed it, a soaking ice cold bed. I am happy that it did not take any time at all for it to get frozen. It easily molded around his knee, however it was a little too cold, and dripped from condensation. What would make this product perfect if it had a terry cloth cover.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: It leaked all over my clothing!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this because it was easy to wear around the house and I was able to move around and have it on. Used it a few times and went on vacation. Put it on and after maybe 10 minutes I noticed my clothing was wet. I looked at it and saw one of the three panels was flat and one of the others was deflating.. turned it around and saw the liquid coming out. Sad because I really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Helping Children

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I've had low back aches that develop during the night for 30 years, and for decades I either took ibuprofen or slept poorly. Then I started using this simple device. I put it on when I wake up around 3:00am every night and it dulls the pain enough that I sleep great and have stopped using ibuprofen all together. I am, err, not small, but the strap is super stretchy and holds the ice pack exactly where I need it. Really great product.
customer_reviews.author: Peter J Dahl

customer_reviews.title: Flexible & Effective
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife last week initially for her lower back flare up. She is now using it on her shoulders, neck, upper back, and even her knee. She uses it hot and cold and loves how it wraps and stays where she puts it. The TheraPAQ is her new best friend. At this price I'm buying a second one so she has one hot and one cold on demand.
customer_reviews.author: Chiberia

customer_reviews.title: Buy Ohu brand instead - same exact thing and cheaper
customer_reviews.text: Exact same product as Ohu brand, I bought them both to compare. Each must have them made in the same factory then put their own label on it. Ohu is cheaper, half the price, and the exact same thing.
customer_reviews.author: MommyTara

customer_reviews.title: Easy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Biggest threat to icing is when icing is a pain in the ass to do. This makes it easy: I take it out of the freezer, slap it on, tighten the velcro, and it stays in place! Past ice packs I've had do not stay in place, and have weak velcro and straps. Of the ones that stay in place, often times the strap insulates the ice pack from your body. This doesn't have this problem, great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Peter J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for lower back pain
customer_reviews.text: I had lower spine surgery so I got this for right after surgery and it works great. Just wrap the velcro around and you are good to go. I still use it when I am having a little lower back or shoulder soreness after working out. Great product for someone looking to ice some sore muscles!
customer_reviews.author: illiniguy

customer_reviews.title: Straps don’t fit much
customer_reviews.text: I use this primarily for cold application. Seems to hold cold well. I don’t really like the straps they don’t seem to fit anywhere that I try and put them. The material does smell very plastic like which has not faded yet I keep it in a plastic bag because of the smell. A better alternative to ice.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Pain in the neck to heat up
customer_reviews.text: I really like the strap to hold it on it is a pain in the neck to heat and keep the gel spread out and if you could it would heat a lot more evenly. But once I finally managed to get it heated it did a good job of helping relax the muscles that were causeing the pain in my neck and shoulder. If It gets easier or better with time I will make changes to this review.
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: Great for arthritic knees!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! This is the third one I have bought! The first two still work great to relieve pain in my arthritic knees, but I wanted a spare. Highly recommend! I keep two in the freezer at all times!
customer_reviews.author: Gramcracker48

customer_reviews.title: Not very good
customer_reviews.text: The chillness doesn't decrease gradually. It's very cold soon after I take it out of the freezer (good thing I suppose) but the chillness drops drastically within 10 minutes of use. I say this comparing with other products that are not as freaking cold in the beginning but they have lasting chillness for well over 20/25 minutes. One good thing is that this one's flexible when frozen as it claims. So it wraps around very well.
customer_reviews.author: Ram

customer_reviews.title: Versatile ice pack.
customer_reviews.text: Like the flexibility of the shape. Can fold to fit the area you want to ice. Gets very cold. Couldn’t quite figure out how to use the strap, though.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Straps not great for smaller areas
customer_reviews.text: Fits around my ankle and while the double straps might be great for putting it on your back, it's kind of hard to fasten them on smaller areas. I could have bought a different cold pack, yes, but didn't realize the straps would be somewhat difficult to use on my ankle. It does cool down quickly and holds it temperature for at least 15 min, the recommended time to use a cold pack
customer_reviews.author: Crjsahm

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes icing is all that helps......
customer_reviews.text: My knees are objecting to the weight I ask them to carry. I've gotten into the habit of wrapping this (after it's frozen) in a towel and then strapping it over my knee at night. It gives me a better night's rest and my knee is less swollen and grumpy in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Parker

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product that should never be sold and will not allow it to be returned
customer_reviews.text: Three chambers for gel. One chamber filled. The other two almost flat/empty. VERY DISAPPOINTED AND IT CANNOT BE RETURNED. The company is dumping faulty product onto consumers and taking customers money leaving customer with a product that should not of passed inspection prior to selling. DO NOT GET RIPPED OFF BY THIS COMPANY.
customer_reviews.author: David Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great Ice Pack
customer_reviews.text: Just got this icepack for my lower back, It has a strap so you wear this and stand it wont fall off you. It holds on tight with its Velcro. When frozen it feels so good real cold for about 1hr 30min.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: heating pad
customer_reviews.text: great, very helpful when I had the flu and during this extreme cold
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Doyle Martines

customer_reviews.title: How convenient this ice pack is to use.  Also received the next day.
customer_reviews.text: This flexible ice pack is convenient to use due to the belt and the velcro attachment. The last one I needed to be sitting in a chair or lying down to keep it in place. I have just recently had back surgery and after doing physical therapy this helps relieve the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Simonson

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my knee!
customer_reviews.text: I have a torn Meniscus and have wanted to avoid surgery. I've been using a compression sleeve and Ice for a couple months. Not until I started using this wrap to apply heat did I feel as if my knee is truly starting to heal. I now think I can avoid surgery! Great product and they have the best price for a gel wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Z

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Ice pack I’ve had so far.
customer_reviews.text: I love this ice pack! I use it on my knee which was a bit of a problem because I think it’s really for a larger area, bit once I figured out how to put it on, it didn’t move and it was wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Blessdnhighlyfavrd

customer_reviews.title: Clumsy but it works.
customer_reviews.text: It is a little difficult to put on by yourself. It slides around your knee while you are trying to adjust the straps to hold it against your knee. Once on it feels great and relieves pain.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S

customer_reviews.title: Coldest ice pack yet
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I opened the box and felt the material knew this was a quality product. Bought this mainly for my shoulders, thinking i could do one at a time. This is perfect I can do both shoulders at the same time. The strap with the velcro helps hold the pact in place. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: BillPA

customer_reviews.title: Hot or cold easy to strap on. Second one I bought
customer_reviews.text: Second one I bought I love these. Very versatile you can use them for hot or cold can you can strap them on your fire use them on your back your knee
customer_reviews.author: Csz

customer_reviews.title: I love this ice/hot pak
customer_reviews.text: My other one leaked after 1 year, bought this one just in time. It's amazing weather I use it hot or cold it relieves the back pain within 20 min.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the TheraPac product to be used to help lessen any swelling in the lower abdomen after surgery. The product exceeded my expectations (can that really happen with a cold pack?). Coming out of the freezer, the product remained extremely cold hour after hour, after hour. The gel, together with the way it is constructed, made it possible for the unit to follow the contours of the body which was a significant added bonus. Simply stated, it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: RAF

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I received my fled. Hot/cold pack approx 36 hrs. after ordering it as well as two shipping updates within that time. I'm supper happy with the customer service. The pack came in nice packaging with clear instructions on how to heat and cool it. I have used it for both cold and hot three times now to reduce pain, and am very happy with the performance. I have wide hips 45 in., so was concerned that the Velcro belt would not fit. I am happy to say that it does fit and stays on my hip nicely. I'm very satisfied with this purchase and would recommend it as well as Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Tracy L. Carnahan

customer_reviews.title: So simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Love this ice pack. I initially purchased it for my neck and lower back, however I just had bunion surgery, and this pack is so wonderful for my entire foot. It stays cool for more than an hour, and freezes up very quickly to be used again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Bella H.

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: I hate it. It doesn't stay closed with the straps over a small area (like an ankle or arm). It only works over the stomach on the back. The material is also rough. DO NOT BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: Caf211

customer_reviews.title: It melted on first use
customer_reviews.text: This hot pack MELTED through literally after two seconds of the first time heating it in the microwave per instructions. And of course Amazon won't let me return it.
customer_reviews.author: chbnq5

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: It's true even fully frozen the gel inside is still flexible, making it useful for knees, elbows and the like. Very simple and effective strap system. Keeps cold temperature very well, easy to put into place and remove. Put a towel or something between the pack and your skin to avoid frostbite. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: dlc2012az

customer_reviews.title: OK, but with one caveat.
customer_reviews.text: The product works almost as designed. I like the long Velcro strap which allows flexibility in positioning on the body. I took off a star, however, because of the distribution of the gel in the three compartments. I found it almost impossible to get the fluid distributed evenly; thus, one of the compartments might get lukewarm while the other gets scorching hot. That limits the product's usability.
customer_reviews.author: G. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cold/hot pack for my boyfriend whose had two back surgeries. He prefers to use it cold to help with swelling and to numb the pain. After purchasing the first one to keep at my house, he used it so often that I went ahead and purchased a second one to keep at his house. He enjoys the ease of strapping it around his waist and it staying in play even if he is active while wearing it. It stays cold for a long time and freezes relatively fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for ice pack for my sprained ankle. I like the velcro straps. Stays cold for a long time. I can see this heat/cold pack having many uses.
customer_reviews.author: Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Great idea!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! I have low back pain and sciatica issues. This works so well to eliminate the inflammation in my lower back. So much easier to use than regular ice pack wrapped in a towel or frozen vegetables! Haha
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: I have this brand for well over a year. I find this the best and I have tried different brands. The seller shipped these to me very promptly.
customer_reviews.author: deannie

customer_reviews.title: Convenient design but short on heat duration.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the product for a stiff neck. I like the design and quality construction, but think it could benefit from a greater volume of gel - it only retains heat for about ten (10) minutes. An ideal application duration should be about twenty (20) minutes. Have not tried it for cold application yet. Otherwise it is OK.
customer_reviews.author: Dr H

customer_reviews.title: Product leaks when you microwave it
customer_reviews.text: This heating pad is great...except for when I microwaved it after the 4th or 5th use. It opened up at (0:45) seconds and created a puncture in the material. Now, I'm unsure I can use it because it makes my microwave steam up and am worried on the impact of the pad. Would return and exchange it but this seller has a NO RETURN POLICY...which is another de-merit. Now, I will need to buy another heating product...and it won't be this product.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna V.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price. Look no further
customer_reviews.text: This gel pac is easy to use as it has a velcro belt to secure in place. I've only used it as a ice pack and it stays cold long enough for my needs. Good quality, looks like it will last for a good while. I will buy again if need be.
customer_reviews.author: M. Locastro

customer_reviews.title: Stayed warm and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this gell hot/cold therapy pain relief pack for my grandmother. The directions were very easy to follow and the pack is light enough that she is able to just use the Velcro straps to hold it in place and she can go on about her day. She enjoyed not having to be confined to the chair or couch where she has been currently using a traditional heating pad. The pack stayed warm for several hours before it needed to be warmed up again. I would recommend this to anyone with a busy lifestyle or someone who doesn’t want to have to be confined to the traditional heating pad. This product works just as it said it would!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and cold
customer_reviews.text: So needed for my pregnant back. I LOVE this. Even while 27 weeks pregnant I am able to wrap the belt around my belly and wear this around the house. I am not sure how many more weeks it will fit me but it works great for now.
customer_reviews.author: Robinelli

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for post-op pain
customer_reviews.text: I used this for post-op shoulder pain. I strapped it across my shoulder diagonally so I could still be active at home. I bought two so one would be frozen and ready when I needed it. It stays cold longer than clear plastic gel ice packs. Sturdy material holds the cold. It stays in place when I use the strap. Great value for pain relief.
customer_reviews.author: TexCzech

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for knee injury
customer_reviews.text: This nice pack really wraps around your joint instead of the others that you have to keep moving because they don't apply the cold to the entire area. This one was a replacement for one I got from a different brand that started leaking. I've had this one for weeks now constantly using it for a persistent knee injury and I've never seen any indication of it leaking or becoming damaged so it's doing well so far in my book.
customer_reviews.author: tywon rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place and keeps cold for a long stretch of time
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this ice wrap one time thus far, but it did the job! It was very cold and stayed cold for quite some time (be sure to put a towel underneath it). I like that it can be wrapped around my knee and stays in place. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: MrsJB8

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this item easy to use, can use on multiple areas of the body. I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: GREG_LKN

customer_reviews.title: Relief
customer_reviews.text: Sought relief from night bouts with sciatica...one suggestion was hot/cold process. Product appears to be well made, the strap is long enough to hold the product anywhere you might wish to "ice down"; Oh, and the process works...warm, then the ice for 1/2 hour...stays in place...
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Cold enough to do the job.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using the same ice pack for several years and it seemed to be loosing its coolness impact. Using the new TheraPAQ for the first time confirmed that impression. The ice pack is flexible and the strap makes it possible to hold it in place if you need to move around.
customer_reviews.author: S. Randon

customer_reviews.title: Makes feeling old easier
customer_reviews.text: If I'd known what getting old was like, I'd have taken better care of myself. But now, I have been suffering from all of the consequences of my professional dancing and other sports. These ice packs have made my compression easier. I'm able to lift things more easily thank mainly to the calisthenics and the ice packs. My joints are pretty much shut but at least I'm able to function without serious pain.
customer_reviews.author: Casandra Lorey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect all the way around💖
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this item...we have BOTH used it...perfect for not only sore muscles but helping simmer down an MS flair up
customer_reviews.author: Julie Pieper

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I've used it for my ankle and lower leg. I wrap the Velcro straps twice around my leg to hold tight. It works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this ice pack!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use toward the end of the healing process for my broken ankle. My physical therapist instructed me to ice it every evening, and keeping ice on an ankle can be difficult. I purchase this and it works GREAT! The straps secure it tightly around my ankle and there is minimal slipping and sliding. It is the perfect solution for my need.
customer_reviews.author: kceasnick

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This seems to freeze well; I have not used for heat. The product folds for easy storage/freezing, which is great. It is sectioned though which means it doesn’t always lay the best when using. Is a cheaper alternative to the more expensive kinds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting / Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This ice pack or is designed in three sections which allows it to confirm to different parts of the body. I use it on my knee to reduce swelling, but we have also used it in the shoulder and arm. Yes we have been doing a lot of hard yard work recently. Back to the icd pack, the strap keeps it in place and is stays cold for a very long time. Great price and fast delivery. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Luczak

customer_reviews.title: Did not cut it.
customer_reviews.text: The idea is great if only it would stay cold. I froze them for a week and they still warmed up much to quickly to be effective. The cold paks at the drugstore stay very cold three times as long as this brand. The two I ordered I gave to an elderly neighbor.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Was the right length to be used on my back
customer_reviews.text: Used it after my back surgery and it was the perfect strap length to wrap around my back. It fit well and didn't cause any agitation. The ice pack doesn't get too cold either so you're not going to have to readjust it like other compression packs that instead of apply a bit of cold to help the healing process turn freezing cold. It can also do a hot compress that I look forward to trying soon.
customer_reviews.author: Enriqueta Jeanbaptise

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC ITEM
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, holds in place, stays icy cold and very comfortable to wear. I bought two of these I like them so much!
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: I gave one star because I have not used the product yet. Will revisit after I have experienced its use. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Very good but could use some improvement
customer_reviews.text: If it had a seam in the middle where you could fold it then he could go around your neck nicer just a suggestion
customer_reviews.author: william donohoe

customer_reviews.title: Works very well for lower back and gel packs freeze guickly.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for lower back and gel packs freeze guickly.
customer_reviews.author: A. S. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Best ice pack ever! Large, flexible and stays cold.
customer_reviews.text: This ice pack is large enough to cover my entire lower back after surgery. It's very flexible and stays cold for almost two hours when I alternate 15 minutes on/off. The stretchy waistband with Velcro closures is comfortable and holds securely. I got two of them so I could always have a fresh cold one available. I haven't tried using it with heat yet.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: About 30.minutes of icing time
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product but I bought it because of my ankle. I wanted to be able to wrap all the way around I wouldn't day it's the best for your ankle. Its definitely great for all other aches and pains! It gets very cold and lasts about 39 minutes for icing. It's been nice!
customer_reviews.author: Jecheima

customer_reviews.title: All the positives of an ice pack with none of the negatives.
customer_reviews.text: I like how cold it actually gets after 2 hrs in the freezer. This best for pain relief and reducing swelling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Works great. First one that stayed on! Yth
customer_reviews.author: rubybarboza

customer_reviews.title: Works well as a hot compress.
customer_reviews.text: This works very well. So far I have only used for a hot compress. Takes 40 seconds to heat.
customer_reviews.author: Randy C.

customer_reviews.title: This is THE BEST re-useable hot/cold pak
customer_reviews.text: This is THE BEST re-useable hot/cold pak. Purchased about one week before wife had total knee replacement surgery - she was told that "ice will be your best friend" following the surgery; and this one definitely has been her best friend. Remains cold for several hours (we haven't tried the heat function yet; too soon in the healing process); and it freezes up in the refrigerator freezer compartment in a period of just under two hours. Remains flexible even when frozen --
customer_reviews.author: jwa1313

customer_reviews.title: Avoid household fights: buy two
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product, so much so that my wife and I bought two, because with only one we fought over it. I've used numerous cold-pak products over the years. All of them disappointed in at least one of three ways: cold dissipates fast ... product is ungainly to handle ... product isn't durable. TheraPAQ holds its cold, is easy to prep and wear, and is rugged.
customer_reviews.author: desrlmt

customer_reviews.title: Look no further
customer_reviews.text: Try keeping ice or coldpacks on your shoulder...impossible without elaborate ace bandage wraps or sealing yourself in cellophane! Even then, the ice packs still fall prey to Newton's law. The beauty of this is its simplicity. The straps actually hold the ice packs where you need them. Easy on easy off. Go for it.
customer_reviews.author: wolfeman

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again; definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Convenient and easy way to use. Have used on knee, ankle and back. Gets nice and cold, and retains cold for quite a while. Have not used as heat pack
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Really a life saver
customer_reviews.text: When you tear a ligament in your knee and need to have a knee replacement but have to wait for your blood oxygen level to go up to a normal level, these will actually be the reason you can get out of bed in the morning. I got two, each one is used on either of my knees. They're fairly well insulated so they stay cool for a very long time (3+ hours) and warm for about half as long.
customer_reviews.author: elias githengu

customer_reviews.title: Great ice pack!
customer_reviews.text: This ice pack stays very cold and the band keeps it in place wherever you use it. The only suggestion I have is to have a cover over it because it is so cold!
customer_reviews.author: B. Malin

product_meta.title: Pain Relief Flexible Ice Pack for Injuries by TheraPAQ | Hot & Cold Therapy Reusable Gel Pack/Heat Wrap - Great for Back, Waist, Shoulder, Neck, Ankle, Knee and Hip (Large Pack:14" X 6")
product_meta.description:
Flexible Ice Pack with Strap : TheraPAQ
A must-have for alleviating pain and injury recovery.
Don't settle for a smaller or lighter gel pack or a hot water bottle.
Grab a TheraPAQ - The only hot & cold pack with a strap wide and long enough to comfortably and securely wrap around your waist, or any body part.

GENERAL
✓Great for lower back pains, stomach aches, stiff neck and shoulder
✓Recommended by physiotherapists and chiropractors for post-surgery of hip replacement, shoulder and knee recovery
✓Also suitable for Ankles and Calves, Shins, Arms, Wrist and Elbows 
✓Keep mobile while strap provides relief 
✓Remains flexible even when frozen

COLD USE INSTRUCTIONS
Cold therapy is recommended for the first 48 hours following the injury. 
✓Store the gel pack in the freezer for at least 2 hours 

HOT USE INSTRUCTIONS
Hot therapy should not be used until 48 hours after the injury. 

Hot Water Heating
✓ Immerse pack in the hot water for approximately 10 minutes

Microwave Heating
✓ Heat at full power for 30 seconds 

OUR GUARANTEE
✓With TheraPAQ, you're taking on absolutely no risk. Nothing can beat our unconditional money-back guarantee.
✓If you're not thrilled with your purchase for any reason, just tell us and we'll refund 100% of your purchase price - anytime! 

Click The Yellow Add To Cart Button At The Top Of This Page And Get Relief To Your Pains

**To see our other GREAT OFFERS, click the 'Thera Health Brands' link under the item price above and on the follow page click 'Thera Health Brands Storefront'.**
feature_bullets: ☑️ ESSENTIAL - Reuseable Hot & Cold Gel Pack with adjustable extra long belt for all body parts. A first aid essential for home, ideal for sports injuries, swelling, muscle pains, post surgery, body aches, recovery after knee replacement, arthritis treatment, joint pain relief and more!

☑️ REUSABLE - Can be used for BOTH warm and cold compression. The gel pack is reuseable and can be freezable while still remaining soft or heated in the microwave. Serves as an ice pack or heating pad. Perfect for any body part: Knee, Arm, Thigh, Leg, Foot, Lumbar, Cervical, Upper and Lower Back, Shoulder, Rotator Cuff, Neck, Calves, Shins, Hips and more

☑️ FAST RELIEF, ANYTIME, ANYWHERE - Keep one handy in your fridge for a first aid icing emergency or your everyday comfort from pain. Just strap on and get the soothing relief from hot or cold therapy right away. Delivers up to 30 minutes of soothing cooling or heat relief for aches and pains

☑️ TRUSTED - Recommended by Physical Therapists, Doctors, Sports Trainers and Chiropractors. TheraPAQ has a non-toxic gel contained in a leak-proof blue plastic pac with elastic hook-and-loop straps (gel pack size: 14" x 6")

☑️ ORDER NOW WITH PEACE OF MIND knowing that we have a 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE, NO QUESTIONS ASKED, NO CATCHES! We stand above and beyond for our customers. If you're not thrilled with your purchase for any reason, just tell us and we'll refund 100% of your purchase price - anytime! ☑️ IDEAL GIFT for Black Friday Deals, Cyber Monday, Prime Deal Day, Easter or Christmas
